ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.Disk_Name *EQ 'G:' *AND *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.%_Used *GT 95 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.Disk_Name *EQ 'P:' *AND *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.%_Used *GT 95 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.Disk_Name *EQ 'Q:' *AND *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.%_Used *GT 95 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.Disk_Name *EQ 'T:' *AND *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.%_Used *GT 95 ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.Disk_Name *EQ 'V:' *AND *VALUE NT_Logical_Disk.%_Used *GT 95 ) )
ROW.TEXT: 逻辑磁盘名称等于G:盘，已用百分比大于95%;7*24;1
